meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lindsay Shields Amy Paull Anna-Lise Santella Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6409.

td.p: Lindsay Shields, a grants and contracts coordinator from Sunnyside, New York
Amy Paull, a stay-at-home mom from The Woodlands, Texas
Anna-Lise Santella, an editor and musicologist from Trout Valley, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,400)

tr.td: PEN NAMES
FRUITY RHYME TIME
BUSINESS & INDUSTRY
THIS & THAT
MARX
LENNON
